welcome_message_body: Welcome to Pune, the vibrant city known for its rich history, cultural heritage, and delicious street food. We invite you to explore and enjoy the charm of Pune during your stay.

restaurants.name: Café GoodLuck
restaurants.description: Café GoodLuck is a café located in Pune.
restaurants.address: 759/75, GoodLuck Chowk (Corner of FC Road and Bhandarkar Road), Pune 411004, Mahārāshtra

restaurants.name: Hotel Roopali
restaurants.description: Hotel Roopali is a indian restaurant located in Pune.
restaurants.address: Survey No 12/27, Fergusson College Road (Sudhabhau Kelkar Road), Pune 411004, Mahārāshtra

restaurants.name: Le Plaisir
restaurants.description: Le Plaisir is a bistro located in Pune.
restaurants.address: Shop No. 4B, Lane 6 Intersection, Off Bhandarkar Road, Deccan Gymkhana (Opp. Kelkar Eye Hospital, Prabhat Road), Pune 411004, Mahārāshtra

restaurants.name: Flavours
restaurants.description: Flavours is a sandwich spot located in Pune.
